author: big_tech_sux

author: _shemnon
content:
Categories for changes to the spec I think are in 4 groups:  
(I) "Breaking"/incompatible changes
(II) Feature parity (data, call)
(III) Performance parity (gas/size)
(IV) New features.

author: _shemnon
content: Changes that would make previously valid EOF1 contracts invalid if they were shipped post-prague would be in category I.  The container itself, behavior "x" fails validation, removing opcodes.

author: _shemnon
content:
Category II to IV could be brought in later forks but it is in a rough priority  order of desired goals: 
II - do things we used to do 
III - do things we used to do without performance/size regression
IV - do things we've never done before
